headline: I Told My Club Members You Could Look at Clorox (CLX), Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 16 Latest Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. The Clorox Company (NYSE:CLX) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. The Clorox Company (NYSE:CLX) is among the handful of consumer goods stocks that have recently surfaced on Jim Cramer’s radar. The CNBC TV host has started to discuss the sector due to […]

headline: A Look at Clorox's (CLX) Valuation After Recent 13% Share Price Dip
summary: Clorox (CLX) shares have been in the spotlight after the company's latest financial performance updates, drawing attention from investors seeking steady household product stocks. In the past month, the stock dipped 13%, sparking discussion about future prospects. See our latest analysis for Clorox. Looking beyond this month's drop, Clorox’s share price return is down over 35% year-to-date and total shareholder return has trailed even further at nearly minus 36% for the past 12 months. With...

headline: 3 Mid-Cap Stocks That Concern Us
summary: Mid-cap stocks often strike the right balance between having proven business models and market opportunities that can support $100 billion corporations. However, they face intense competition from scaled industry giants and can be disrupted by new innovative players vying for a slice of the pie.
